Strike Back: May ready melee attack against melee foes that are out of range

Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 9; O1: 7; O2: 7; O3: 7; O4: 6; O5: 6; O6: 6; O7: 6; O8: 6; O9: 6 Spell DC: O: 13
Spells:
Baleful Polymorph (Punative Transformation5 Tran): R75' Target becomes 1 HD creature (DC 23 Fort neg)
Elemental Body I (Water Form4 Tran): Self becomes small air (+2 Dexterity, +2 AC, fly 60', whirlwind), earth (+2 Strength, +4 AC, earth glide), fire (+2 Dexterity, +2 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+2 Constitution, +4 AC, swim 60', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision for 20 min
Elemental Body II (Water Form5 Tran): Self becomes medium air (+4 Dexterity, +3 AC, fly 60', whirlwind), earth (+4 Strength, +5 AC, earth glide), fire (+4 Dexterity, +3 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+4 Constitution, +5 AC, swim 60', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision for 20 min
Elemental Body III (Water Form6 Tran): Self becomes large air (+2 Strength, +4 Dexterity, +4 AC, fly 60', whirlwind), earth (+6 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +2 Constitution, +6 AC, earth glide), fire (+4 Dexterity, +2 Constitution, +4 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+2 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +6 Constitution, +6 AC, swim 60', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision, immunity to bleeding, critical hits, and sneak attacks for 20 min
Elemental Body IV (Water Form7 Tran): Self becomes huge air (+4 Strength, +6 Dexterity, +4 AC, fly 120', whirlwind), earth (+8 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +6 AC, earth glide), fire (+6 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +4 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+4 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +8 Constitution, +6 AC, swim 120', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision, immunity to bleeding, critical hits, and sneak attacks, DR 5/- for 20 min
Fluid Form (O6 Tran): Self gains DR 10/slashing, +10 reach, +60' Swim, amphibious features, and ability to squeeze through cracks for 20 min
Geyser (O5 Conj): R1200' 5' sq inflicts 3d6 HP fire and 10d6 falling (DC 18 Ref half fire only), and surrounding 50' radius inflicts 1d6 HP fire, for conc + 1 rd
Greater Scrying (Water Sight7 Divi): Self views and casts detection and communication spells on target for 20 hr (DC 23 Will special neg)
Scrying (Water Sight4 Divi): Self views target for 20 min (DC 23 Will neg)
Seamantle (O8 Conj): 30' water column hinders fire spells and gives self +8 AC, +4 Reflex, 30' slam attack, and touch that extinguishes fires for 20 min
Slipstream (O2 Conj): Creates wave that moves touched 10'/rd (20' downhill) and gives +20' Swim for 200 min
Touch Of The Sea (O1 Tran): Touched gains +30' swim speed and +8 Swim, plus may use run action and may always take 10 while swimming, for 20 min
Tsunami (O9 Conj): R1200' 10'x10'x40' wave moves 30'/60'/rd over land/water, inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning (DC 22 Fort half), +31 CMB to knock down and sweep away for 5 rd
Vortex (O7 Evoc): R1200' 15' radius inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning (DC 20 Ref neg) on first contact, then 1d8 HP/rd on Medium and smaller (DC 20 Ref neg) for 19 rd; self may eject creatures from vortex
Wall Of Ice (O4 Evoc): R300' Creates 20 10' x 20 inch thick ice wall or 23' hemisphere for 20 min
Water Breathing (O3 Tran): Touched can breathe underwater for 40 hrs total
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half or all spell damage to cold damage; uses +1 spell slot
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Final Revelation (Waves Mystery): May apply Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell to cold and water spells w/out cost
Freezing Spells: Target failed save on spells that inflict cold damage also slows target for 1d4 rd
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Punitive Transformation: May use Baleful Polymorph effects, lasting 20 rd, to transform target into harmless animal 3/dy
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Water Form: May use Elemental Body IV effects to become huge water elemental for 20 hr 1/dy
Water Sight: May use Greater Scrying effects via pool 20 rd/dy
